typedef struct _p3key p3key

Function Documentation

int p3_get_key ( p3key *  key  ) 

Function:
p3_get_key
Description:
Get an encryption key.
Inputs:
  • key: The P3 key structure. The flag in the structure contains information about the key, such as its type (size). The new key is returned in this structure.
Outputs:
  • int: Status
    • 0: OK
    • <0: Error
    • >0: Key not obtained, retry later

References InFile, _p3key::key, NULL, p3buf, p3errmsg(), p3KEY_FILE, p3MSG_CRIT, p3MSG_DEBUG, and _p3key::size.

Referenced by buffer_handler().
